short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automated notes for foreign language online classes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our Chrome extension enhances your online classes by providing automated note-taking capabilities. With the power of ChatGPT, our extension is designed specifically for Google Meet. After each lesson, it generates comprehensive notes and sends them directly to your email, saving you time and effort. Stay organized and never miss important details with our convenient and efficient Chrome extension. Simplify your online learning experience today.


Focus on the lesson, we take care of the notes!
